text:
@holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips @edeandrea At Devoxx Poland, Christina Aldan used this to her advantage: instead of blending in, she presented in a long red dress, making a point.

It was a non-technical talk on "How to say no". It was a good talk, so I am sure she got good ratings. But what if she had talked tech?
